‚≠êJPMorgan Chase has orchestrated the full lifecycle of a $50 million short-term US commercial paper bond for Galaxy Digital Holdings, tokenizing it entirely on the  $SOL  Solana blockchain for faster issuance and settlement in a real-world test of efficiency.   - The deal, snapped up by heavyweights Coinbase and Franklin Templeton, relied on Circle's USDC stablecoin for seamless payments and redemptions, marking one of the first on-chain debt transactions by a major US bank on a public network.   - This step beyond JPMorgan's Ethereum experiments signals broader institutional trust in Solana's speed and low costs, paving the way for more tokenized assets that could unlock trillions in traditional finance by blending them with crypto's programmable edge.   - Follow me to catch the latest cash flow signals that will bring you big profits in no time #TrendingTopic

ü•á  THE BITCOIN ETF WAS THE NO. 1 ETF LAUNCH OF ALL TIME

When the first Bitcoin ETF launched, there had only ever been 9000 ETF launches in U.S. history. Bitcoin was number one!

üìä  "It pulled in $36 billion in assets in its first year." ‚ÄîMatt Hougan, Bitwise

Number 2 on the list was the Nasdaq 100 (QQQ).

Hougan said in his keynote at Solana Breakpoint, "That's why this question of when the institutions are coming matters so much, because even a little bit of capital from this $260 trillion investment market going into our little $3.1 trillion market would have a big effect."

$SOL stands to benefit immensely from ETFs ‚Äî the fastest growing financial product in the world.

$SOL  SOL cheapens amid TVL decline and interest in meme tokens  - Key takeaways: SOL funding ratios indicate low optimism among bulls after a 46% drop in value despite the introduction of Firedancer and increased network operations at Solana.   Solana DApp profits and DEX activity have declined significantly, suggesting general market fatigue, even as the #Solana  ecosystem grows. the last four weeks, the price has not been able to stay above $ 145. The decline in network activity amid the decreased need for decentralized applications has a negative impact on the outlook for #SOL  . Solana's total #blockchain  value (TVL) has declined by more than $ 10 billion since its peak in September; data on the blockchain shows that user activity is declining at a faster pace. The total blockchain blockchain value (TVL) on Solana has been declining since peaking at $ 15 billion in September. Decreased investment in smart contracts is increasing the supply of SOLs for sale. Meanwhile, revenue from decentralized applications (DApps) on Solana fell to $ 26 million per week, down from $ 37 million two months earlier. Traders' interest in memcoins has waned since the sharp collapse of the cryptocurrency market on Oct. 10, exposing the vulnerability of leveraged positions and the general liquidity of smaller altcoins. Regardless of whether derivatives markets exacerbated the move, traders have become less confident in dealing with DEX platforms following the $ 19 billion liquidation event. The launch of the decentralized exchange (DEX) on Solana in January triggered a surge in volumes to $ 313.3 billion that month. According to DefiLlama, that activity has since declined 67%, which partially explains the more modest revenue trend of Solana's DApps. https://transscreen.ru/en/news28099

Zeus is unlocking its next era at Solana Breakpoint 2025

Following the launch of the unified Zeus app, we are now building institutional-grade MPC infrastructure to unlock Bitcoin and UTXO assets for onchain capital markets on Solana.

From user experience to custody and execution, BTCFi needs a new foundation ‚õà
The new Zeus app marks the user layer

A single interface to mint zBTC, earn yield, stake, and manage delegation rewards. 

Over the past year, Zeus enabled the deployment of 513 BTC into Solana DeFi, making Bitcoin productive onchain.

But adoption revealed the real bottleneck.
BTCFi cannot scale without institutional-grade custody

Most Bitcoin and UTXO assets remain idle due to closed and non UTXO native systems. 

Zeus is building UTXO native MPC to enable secure non custodial treasury management and Solana native execution.

Zeus app for users.
Zeus MPC for institutions.
Solana as the execution layer.
What comes next

With the Zeus app live, Zeus is expanding beyond product unification into MPC infrastructure and developer tooling, opening the path for UTXO native applications to scale on Solana and bringing Bitcoin into modern onchain capital markets.

Revealed at Solana Breakpoint:
Hex Trust is launching Wrapped $XRP ( $wXRP ), fully 1:1 backed by XRP, bringing XRP liquidity into Solana DeFi for the first time.

Powered by LayerZero‚Äôs omnichain standard, wXRP will be:

‚Ä¢ redeemable 1:1 for XRP
‚Ä¢ usable in DEXs, lending, collateral and yield strategies
‚Ä¢ deployed first on Solana, with multi-chain expansion planned

This is not a synthetic asset.
This is institutionally backed XRP entering DeFi.

One of the most important XRP developments in years.

$SOL Solana Holders ‚Äì The Math Behind Collective HODLing
SOL price Dec 13, 2025: ~$132‚Äì$133‚Ä®ATH: $294 (Jan 2025)
Real order book math:‚Ä®‚Ä¢ +5% move ($133 ‚Üí $140) typically needs buying ~5,000‚Äì10,000 SOL (aggregated depth data).‚Ä®‚Ä¢ +20% move often <50,000 SOL in thin sell-side layers.
Supply shock math:‚Ä®If thousands of us cancel all sell orders below $300 (or $500):‚Ä®‚Üí Sell-side depth there drops sharply (or near zero).‚Ä®Daily spot volume: 40‚Äì50 million SOL traded ($5‚Äì6B).‚Ä®Net buy pressure (inflows + DeFi/memecoin demand): often millions of SOL.‚Ä®Result: Modest buying clears thin books ‚Üí price gaps up fast to our higher limits.
Historical proof:‚Ä®‚Ä¢ 2024‚Äì2025 memecoin/DeFi boom removed massive liquidity ‚Üí ATH $294.‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Thin supply phases led to 50‚Äì100% rallies in weeks.
